BackstoryDef.title: Creche-Baby
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was born with an unexpected xenotype the parents placed them in a creche and forgot about them. [PAWN_pronoun] woke up in crypto-sleep casket, which was eventually loaded onto a Rim-Bound shuttle. They awoke inside the hold of the freighter, where [PAWN_pronoun] ate as little as possible so as not to be noticed. [PAWN_possessive] body suffered from privation.

BackstoryDef.title: Creche-Raised
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a creche where they learned a core curriculum based on institutional standards, the nature of that institution being open to debate. [PAWN_possessive] general acuity for games and contests was minimal, though they were well liked. [PAWN_nameDef] will never be a leader or a fighter, but they may do something someday.

BackstoryDef.title: Iceballer Child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the harsh surface of an Iceball, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to survive with the help of their parents who were skilled in crafting and living off the land. [PAWN_pronoun] received limited formal education, but gained a wealth of practical skills necessary for survival in the hostile environment.

BackstoryDef.title: fringe settlement miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a fringe settlement on the outskirts of a bustling Urbworld, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned to mine and scavenge for resources to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: fringe settlement child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a fringe settlement on the outskirts of a bustling Urbworld. Despite the lack of resources and opportunities, [PAWN_pronoun] was determined to make a better life for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] was resourceful and adaptable, learning to make do with whatever was available.

BackstoryDef.title: Forest-Born Fringer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in the thick forests surrounding an urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in by a group of outlanders who taught [PAWN_objective] how to survive off the land. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually discovered by urbworld authorities and sent away to the next colony without any preparation.

BackstoryDef.title: Forest-Born Fringer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised in the thick forests surrounding an urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in by a group of well-meaning outlanders who wanted [PAWN_objective] to adopt their way of life. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was an extra mouth being fed without paperwork. Following procedure urbworld authorities put them into a crypto sleep casket and sent them to next departing shuttle without any preparation.

BackstoryDef.title: Fringer child from Thalia IV
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in one of the crime-ridden and corrupt settlements around the district, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to rely on [PAWN_possessive] wits and physical skills to survive. Despite the constant danger, [PAWN_pronoun] also developed a strong sense of community and the ability to read and manipulate people to [PAWN_possessive] advantage.
